meanings.definition: A person or thing that creates space between objects.
meanings.sent1: The spacers in the puzzle helped me separate the pieces easily.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter used spacers to ensure the shelves were evenly spaced.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf used spacers to keep the toys just out of reach.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter acted as spacers, filling the room with joy and light.
meanings.sent5: The spacers in the necklace made each bead stand out beautifully.

meanings.definition: A device used to maintain a specific distance between two objects.
meanings.sent1: The wheel spacers on the car helped improve its stability.
meanings.sent2: The architect used spacers to ensure the windows were aligned perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The spacers in the game kept the players at a safe distance from each other.
meanings.sent4: The music acted as spacers, creating a soothing atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: The spacers in the bracelet kept the charms evenly spaced.

meanings.definition: A material used to fill gaps or create separation between components.
meanings.sent1: The foam spacers prevented the fragile items from breaking during shipping.
meanings.sent2: The gardener used spacers to keep the plants from crowding each other.
meanings.sent3: The spacers in the sandwich added an unexpected crunch to each bite.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as spacers, bridging the gap between the two friends.
meanings.sent5: The spacers in the circuit board ensured proper airflow between the components.
